title: Ball-milling preparation of ZnFe2O4/AgI nanocomposite with enhanced photocatalytic activity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31193-31204
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05539J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Meiling Liu, Yan Quan, Mengjie Feng, Chunguang Ren, Zhonghua Wang
A ZnFe2O4/AgI nanocomposite photocatalyst was prepared using the ball-milling method, leading to the formation of a heterojunction. This resulted in enhanced photocatalytic activity for the photooxidation of various organic compounds.
